wikipedia_page.main: John "Jack" Hilton (2 May 1921 – 23 December 1998) was an English rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s, and director. He played at representative level for Great Britain and England, and at club level for Wigan, as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5. He later became a director at Wigan, and also had a spell as club chairman.
